Legacy Document

Inside Macintosh: Operating System Utilities /
Chapter 2 - System Error Handler / System Error Handler Reference

Resources

This section describes the system error alert table ('DSAT') resource. The System Error Handler uses resources of this type to determine what to display in the system startup alert box and the system error alert box. You should never need to access or change these resources; the information is provided for completeness only.

Subtopics
The System Error Alert Table Resource
